Woodcraft of Chattanooga: July Classes
    thingshappening

    Woodcraft of Chattanooga: July Classes

    When: 2024-07-01 (Sunday)
    Time: Varies
    Venue: Woodcraft of Chattanooga
    Address: 5824 Brainerd Road Chattanooga, TN 37411
    Entrance Fee: Varies
    Event Website
      #woodworking#craft#woodcraft-of-chattanooga

    The sheer number of classes and events Woodcraft puts on is impressive! If you're just starting out in woodwork, want to learn a new technique or just want to socialize with likeminded people, I think you'll find what you're looking for below. Check the event website for more information on each class.


    Classes:
    July 1st: Sawdust Social: Campfire Roasting Fork
    July 2nd and 9th: Woodworking Fundamentals
    July 2nd: Pen Turning 101
    July 5th: Natural Edge Bowl Building
    July 6th: Woodworking Fundamentals
    July 6th: Bowl Turning 104: Platters
    July 6th: Intro to Turning
    July 7th: Bowl Turning 101: The Basics
    July 8th: Basic Box Making
    July 9th: Pen Turning 102: Using Acrylics
    July 11th: Intro to Turning
    July 12th: Date Night: Popper and Stopper
    July 12th and 13th: Woodworking Fundamentals II
    July 13th: Spindle Turning 101: The Basics
    July 13th: Date Night: Plant Stand
    July 14th: Wine Bottle Holder
    July 16th: Making a Custom Knife
    July 16th and 30th: Pen Turning 103
    July 18th: Kitchen Cabinetmaking 103: Shaker Doors and Drawer Fronts
    July 18th and 19th: Spindle Turning 102: Furniture July 19th: Kitchen Cabinetmaking 104: Applying Finishes
    July 20th: Spindle Turning 103: Taming of the Skew
    July 20th: Join Thru Joinery: Mortise and Tenons
    July 20th: Join Thru Joinery: Half-Laps
    July 21st: Kitchen Cabinetmaking 105: Decorative Details and Installation Techniques
    July 27th: Journey Thru Joinery: Rabbets and Dados
    July 27th: Journey Thru Joinery: Cope and Stick
    July 27th: Bowl Turning 101: The Basics

    If you like woodcraft and don't see anything on this list that interests you, I don't really know what to say. If you do partake, I hope it's a great time!
